import React, { useState } from 'react' const Forms1 = () => { const [userregister, setUserregister] = useState({ username: "", email: "", phone: "", password: "" }) const handleInput = (e) => { const name = e.target.name const value = e.target.value console.log(name) console.log(value) setUserregister({ ...userregister, [name]: value }) } const [allentry, setAllentry] = useState([]) const submitForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // const newEntry = {...userregister } setAllentry([...allentry, ...userregister]) } return ( <>

) } export default Forms1
